Posts.Content: My friends mother is diabetic and recently diagnosis a cyst in breast which removed after operation and biopsy shows malengency . After post operation the doctor advice us follow up with chemotherapy and radio therapy. But the patient is already diabetic and also have a creatinin approx.2.8. I request your goodself to provide me with good suggestion/ advice. Hope I will defiantly provided with fruitful suggestion. Thanking you
Posts.Title: Breast cancer
